main event: Three observers called Craig Air Force Base to report seeing an orange glowing object in the sky that moved in a straight line.
interesting points: Two officers at Craig Air Force Base observed a B-52 aircraft with glowing orange lights, and a separate light the size of a basketball moving away from the aircraft at a high rate of speed.
One witness, a young lady, reported seeing a very small, very bright, pale orange object moving in a straight line for approximately 10 minutes.
Another witness, a male adult, called to report an orange glow in the sky, but did not provide any additional information.
A third witness, another young man, called to report an orange glow high in the sky, but did not provide any further details.
The report includes a tape recording of the first conversation.
result: The investigating officer concluded that the sighting was of a B-52 aircraft with glowing orange lights, and a separate light that was likely the size of a basketball moving away from the aircraft at a high rate of speed.
sighted object: An orange glowing object in the sky
